hero.name: Sabeeh Hassan
hero.title: Frontend Developer
hero.description: I'm a frontend-focused software engineer with expertise in React, Next.js, and TypeScript. I build responsive, high-performance web applications with clean code and intuitive user interfaces.

about.name: Sabeeh Hassan Farooqui
about.title: About Me
about.introPara1: My name is Sabeeh Hassan Farooqui. I am a professional and enthusiastic frontend developer with hands-on expertise in React, Next.js, TypeScript, and modern web technologies. I am a quick learner with a self-learning attitude, always eager to explore new technologies and solve complex problems.
about.introPara2: I recently completed an internship at Codesy Consulting where I contributed to a production-level Next.js application, building responsive UI components and working on AI-powered features. I'm passionate about creating intuitive user interfaces, writing clean and reusable code, and delivering high-performance web experiences.
about.introPara3: My core strength lies in JavaScript-based development, and I enjoy working with React, Next.js, and TypeScript to build scalable applications. I'm actively seeking junior frontend opportunities where I can contribute to AI-enabled products and continue growing as a developer.

experience.title: Experiences
experience.job1Description: Completed my first internship at Codesy Consulting, where I worked on a Next.js–based web development project. I contributed to UI component development, responsive layouts, and feature implementation while gaining hands-on experience with modern web technologies and best development practices.
experience.job2Description: Completed several university projects involving the design and development of web applications using React and JavaScript. Focused on creating responsive layouts, implementing user-friendly interfaces, and improving application behavior through debugging and optimization. These projects helped strengthen problem-solving skills and understanding of modern frontend development workflows.

contact.title: Contact With Me
contact.subtitle: If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact me. I am open to any work opportunities that align with my skills and interests.
contact.formDescription: Fill out the form below and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.availabilityDescription: Currently open to frontend development opportunities and exciting projects.
contact.successMessage: Message sent successfully! I'll get back to you soon.

skills.title: Skills & Expertise
skills.subtitle: Technologies and tools I use to bring ideas to life

footer.name: Sabeeh Hassan
footer.tagline: Frontend Developer passionate about creating elegant solutions to complex problems. Let's build something amazing together.
footer.availability: Available for freelance projects and full-time opportunities. Let's create something extraordinary!
footer.madeWith: Made with using Next.js & Tailwind CSS

projects.title: Selected Projects
projects.subtitle: Here are some of my recent projects that showcase my skills and experience
projects.noProjects: No projects found in this category
projects.project1Description: Developed Testify, an AI-powered quiz web application using React, Node.js, and MySQL. Implemented automated quiz generation and secure file upload functionality. Designed role-based dashboards for admins, instructors, and students. Enabled student performance tracking and result analytics.
projects.project2Description: Created a full-stack web application with React (Frontend), Node.js (Backend), and MongoDB (Database). Designed and implemented RESTful APIs to handle client–server communication. Implemented CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete) for efficient project record management.
projects.project3Description: Designed and developed an interactive Crazy Eight card game using JavaScript. Implemented core gameplay mechanics including card shuffling, dealing, and rule enforcement. Features smooth animations and intuitive user interface.
projects.project4Description: Built a web-based cipher encoding and decoding tool. Supported multiple classical encryption techniques such as Caesar, Rail Fence, Columnar Transposition, and OTP. User-friendly interface for learning cryptography concepts.
